title: Javascript-Free
desc: Components are pure CSS so you don't need to use javascript.

title: Preprocessor
desc: Components are coded with LESS Preprocessor. Use precompiled CSS or build it with the LESS source.

title: Build tools
desc: Includes Gulpfile for compiling LESS to CSS with Autoprefixer.

title: Fully customizable
desc: PCC's very basic style can be extended and customized with themes.
